title: Sunny Hospital
text:
As an Operations Manager at NOAA PolarWatch (Polar node of CoastWatch), I oversee daily opeations, focusing on data processing and partner/user engagement.
Areas of expertise and interest include data management, statistical modeling, and scientific computing.

title: Sunny Hospital
text:
Education
M.S. Statistics (2011) | Colorado State University
Thesis: “Modeling Bobcat Movements in Relation to Landscape Features Using Classical Movement Models and Artificial Neural Networks with Genetic Algorithms”
B.S. Computer Science, Statistics (2001) | University of California, Davis

title: Sunny Hospital
text:

PolarWatch Ops Manager (2022-Present) | NOAA CoastWatch/UCSC

Application Developer (2005-2009) | NOAA PIFSC
